Text: A message from the Mayor of New YorkDear Colleague I would like to direct your attention to a letter from New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani which you can find on the web site of the ASME International Mechanical Congress and Exposition congress In the wake of September Congress provides a special opportunity to consider our current challenges Now more than ever engineers need to share information and exchange views Judging from early registration we expect record attendance at this years Congress which will take place in New York on November In addition to a truly outstanding technical program participants will enjoy a wide range of opportunities for exploring the perspectives of colleagues from different companies industries and countries around the globe I look forward to greeting you in New York next month Sincerely David L Belden Executive Director ASME International
